item.title: KDP
item.description: score:190 Chances: Keurig Dr Pepper Inc (KDP) recently announced a dividend of $0.22 per share, payable on 2024-04-12 The company’s product portfolio runs broad across the beverage space after several acquisitions over the years, from soft drinks like Snapple and Dr. Pepper to its Keurig K-Cup coffee pods and even chocolate milk staple Yoo-Hoo.
